select b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_like l WHERE l.bno = b.bno) AS likeCnt from tbl_board b join tbl_donate_round dr on b.drno = dr.drno left join tbl_donate_action da on dr.drno = da.drno where b.status = 'ACTIVE' and dr.status = 'ACTIVE' group by b.bno, dr.voiddate, dr.goalamount having dr.goalamount - coalesce(sum(da.amount), 0) > 0 order by dr.voiddate limit 1

select b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_like l WHERE l.bno = b.bno) AS likeCnt from tbl_board b where drno is not null and status = 'ACTIVE' and drno in (select drno from tbl_donate_round where status = 'ACTIVE') order by regdate desc limit 3
